messages.messageBody:
Speaking of movies, which we have been... <g>

This list was created for Movielovers! Join us for discussion of the
best new movies, the best old videos, and everything in between.
Share your favorite movie moments, discuss background details, movie
goofs, favorite actors and actresses, and yes - even how movies can
be used in homeschooling. But this isn't strictly a "how to enrich
your curriculum" list - it's just for homeschoolers of all ages who
love movies!

To subscribe, send a blank message to:
mailto:Homeschooling-Movielovers-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

Or visit the website:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Homeschooling-Movielovers
